title: PBE Password not updating??
body:
Soooooooo...........

A few weeks ago I was kicked out of the regular league client and it said that someone else logging in, a little scared that someone got my password I immediately went to change it (just in case). I have had no issues logging in since then and haven't been kicked out of the regular client.

However, I went over to the PBE client and typed in my new password and it didn't work. After a few unsuccessful attempts I tried my old password and it worked like a charm. This isn't really a big issue, but I am wondering if the new password should have been updated. 

I know that the PBE is a completely separate account, but I am just wondering if this is expected behavior or a bug. My username on PBE and Regular client are the same "miniquandt". I am fine with my PBE account being the old password, I figured I would say something just incase this is a bug.

replies.body: Working as intended! Since they are 2 completely separate accounts, any password changes will not carry over.
Never mind. I figured it out. You have to go over to the PBE boards. oops my bad.
